site_meta_data.title: Bharghav's Blog - Coding and Adventures
site_meta_data.author: Bharghav
site_meta_data.description: Bharghav's coding journey - Work and life stories through the keyboard of an open-minded Software Engineer

name: Bharghav
bio_1: I'm known as Bharghav in professional life.
bio_2: I started my career as an AI intern, focusing on chatbots, and later transitioned to fullstack web development.
bio_3: My coding journey began in 2020, transitioning from a commerce student to a passionate Software Engineer.
bio_4: I'm deeply passionate about JS/TS technologies, web development, and eCommerce solutions.
bio_5: Frequently, I work on projects involving Arduino and Raspberry Pi, merging hardware with software creativity.
bio_6: I'm a tech enthusiast who loves to tinker with hardware, from building home automation systems to managing my homelab server.
bio_7: I enjoy the thrill of exploring diverse investment opportunities, from stocks to crypto, and discovering the art of growing wealth through financial market.
bio_8: My motto is to never stop learning, keep building, and continue seeking new adventures.
bio_9: I'm a passionate Software Engineer based in Chennai, India.
bio_10: Living in Chennai, India, I draw inspiration from the vibrant culture and diverse landscapes.
bio_11: I have a deep love for coding and the thrill of travel, combining both into my journey by being a digital nomad.
bio_12: I'm a multi-instrumentalist, skilled in flute, violin, and keyboard, weaving music into my life.
bio_13: As a gamer, I find joy in video games, with PS5 being my favorite.
bio_14: I'm an avid cyclist, embarking on adventurous tours to explore new horizons.
bio_start_coding: I began my coding journey in 2020, transitioning from a commerce student to a passionate Software Engineer.
bio_first_job: I started my career as an AI intern, working on chatbots, before transitioning to fullstack web development.
bio_passion: I'm deeply passionate about JS/TS technologies, web development, and eCommerce solutions.
bio_blog_purpose: I started this blog to document and share my knowledge and experiences.
lost_message: Hmm... it seems that you're lost
return_message: But don't worry, you can find plenty of other things on my homepage.

blog.intro: I write mostly about web development, tech-related topics, and sometimes share my personal adventures. Use the search below to filter by title.

about_description: More about me and this blog
resume_description: My professional career, experiences, and skills.
